Subtitle: Turn messy text into clean, structured data and automated actions.
Goal: Convert unstructured text (emails, invoices, reports, etc.) into structured records and trigger simple automations.
Key Features: • File/text upload in UI • Schema/field configuration • JSON/row output to DB • Hooks to notifications/APIs
LLM Role: • Extract entities and fields from raw text • Normalize messy text into structured formats • Generate follow-up actions or summaries
Ideal Learner Outcome: Can build an LLM-driven extraction pipeline with UI + backend + DB that powers real workflow automations.

Mission Title: LLM Knowledge Assistant over Your Data
Subtitle: Ask questions, get grounded answers from your own documents.
Goal: Let users query their own PDFs/docs and get cited, grounded answers.
Key Features: • Document upload & indexing flow • Chat-style Q&A interface • Source highlighting / citations • Simple vector/retrieval layer
LLM Role: • Generate answers conditioned on retrieved passages • Summarize and synthesize across multiple docs • Explain and cite sources
Ideal Learner Outcome: Can implement a basic RAG-style knowledge assistant over private documents, end-to-end.

Subtitle: Compare options with an AI that scores, explains, and recommends.
Goal: Help users make complex decisions by comparing multiple options using weighted criteria.
Key Features: • Define options & criteria (with weights) • MCDA-style scoring & ranking • Streamlit UI with tables & charts • Exportable decision brief
LLM Role: • Interpret qualitative context into criterion scores • Generate ranked recommendations • Explain trade-offs and reasoning in natural language
Ideal Learner Outcome: Can design and ship an LLM-powered decision support tool that combines MCDA logic with explainable AI.

Subtitle: Let an AI talk to your databases and APIs in plain language.
Goal: Bridge natural language queries and real operational systems (DB + external APIs).
Key Features: • Connect to SQL/NoSQL DB • Integrate at least one external API • NL query and filter builder • Result explanations & simple dashboards
LLM Role: • Translate natural language into queries/filters • Interpret DB/API responses and summarize • Suggest follow-up queries or actions
Ideal Learner Outcome: Can wire an LLM into real company data & services and expose it through a safe, guided UI.

Mission Title: AI Workflow Copilot for a Role
Subtitle: An AI assistant that guides a real job from start to finish.
Goal: Assist a specific role (e.g. sales, analyst, HR) through a repeatable workflow.
Key Features: • Multi-step wizard or multipage UI • Role-specific task templates • Draft generation (emails, reports, briefs) • Optional logging to DB or tools
LLM Role: • Drafts content at each step • Validates/checks against given criteria • Suggests next steps and improvements
Ideal Learner Outcome: Can design and deliver an LLM copilot that supports a real-world role with structured workflows and AI assistance.
